full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 CENTRAL INVESTIGATION BUREAU POLICE DEPARTMENT BANGKOK, THAILAND. Mar 12 1987 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN This is to certify that MR: CHAROBIE a Thai nationality, has no criminal record in Thailand Pol. Maj. Gen.
